dataList.place: Corridoio Distrutto del Laboratorio di K Corp.
dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: La cosa è preoccupante. Non do troppo peso alle altre sezioni, ma se questa venisse attaccata, causerebbe una grossa perdita di progressi...

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Mr. Dongrang, c'è in linea una chiamata urgente da parte della Direttrice Alfonso.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Oh benone... Vorrà farmi una lavata di capo. Potresti rispondere tu al posto mio, Samjo?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: L'ho già fatto, ma la sua pazienza è al limite.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: E va bene... Immagino di non potermela scampare. Scusatemi un secondo.
While Dongrang was away, we spotted an employee who hadn't evacuated across the hallway, nervously wandering.
Watch closely, Executive Manager. If you see a lackey snooping around like that in the middle of danger...
It most likely means you've found someone with useful information. It would be wise to make good use of them.
Hey, we're agents from a subcontracting firm here to deal with this commotion. What's going on?

dataList.title: Laboratorio di K Corp.
dataList.content: St-Sto cercando Ms. Shrenne, ma non la trovo da nessuna parte. Devo dirgli di evacuare la zona...

dataList.title: Laboratorio di K Corp.
dataList.content: Ha lasciato il computer acceso... Dove si è cacciata...
Ah... Actually, she-
Alright, we'll find her. You evacuate first.

dataList.title: Laboratorio di K Corp.
dataList.content: Grazie mille.
Now, while the terrorists' informant has been removed, the staff is still in a muddle, and her computer is left on.
We're in a complete tactical advantage. It didn't even cost us any strength.
Probably thanks to the pride in this achievement, Outis sounded much more excited than usual... But no one else seemed to care.
The computer Shrenne used... Its password was "missyouran", right...
<We were told she was in close relations with Ran, exchanging lots of messages...>
<If we're lucky, we might find a pending email or some other clue on her computer.>
<It should hopefully give us some insight into the technology liberation alliance, too.>
You're quick to understand. That was unexpe- I mean... very much expected of my executive manager.
Alright, good. The problem is how we're gonna sneak into the office... Who on our team is gonna walk in there bold-faced and get it done without rousing suspicion...
<If I had to choose a Sinner who can keep a still face and avoid suspicion...>
Give this humble knight one more chance, and I shall succeed...!
<Meursault! Think you can handle it?>
...As long as you command.
<Yeah, I'm counting on you.>
